content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: DeleteScopeHostname path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/cdn/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites/{site_id}/scopes/{scope_id}/hostnames/{domain} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name scopeid
desc a scope id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name domain
desc the hostname to remove from a scope
in path
required true
schema
type str
name disabletransparentmode
desc whether or not to remove the hostname from a cdn sites cdn scope or its waf scope when true this call removes the hostname from a cdn sites scope instead of loading from a cdn sites waf scope if the site has waf service
in query
required false
schema
type bool
format bool
sum delete a scope hostname
responses
title: 7_Configuration_DeleteScopeHostname_38.json
